subject.normal: Lost e-mail subscribers after migrating from Feedburner to Google

body.para: Dear August, There is no support coming from Google. We're all in this together in that we've all been hung out to dry. Only way I see Google responding is if a viable competitor to Feedburner emerges. Then watch how quickly Google gets its act together and starts providing real technical support in this forum.

quote.quotepara: Does Google have any response to the disappearing email subscribers after forcing Feed Burner users to migrate to the Google platform? This is a big problem, how is it being addressed to get the email subscribers back?
I can't find a number to all or even email about this. How do we get support for this?
Thanks for any help you can provide!
